entry.title: Photos Post 16: Handwritings, Part 18
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to let you know that 6 jpgs were replaced by higher quality ones and that 4 jpgs versions have been uploaded to Eternal Moments: 10 high resolutions from the XYZ Unknown Collections.
The direct link to the 10 jpgs of the letter in the smallest gallery of handwritings: Collection Handwritings.
Please kindly share the link with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam
